text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea You should be able to rock whatever outfit you want. Unfortunately not limited to tech as evidenced by so many areas where males are trying to police how women dress/look/behave… get those Louboutins out next time! 😁
